Colors

Convey meaning through color with a handful of color utility classes. Includes support for styling links with hover states, too. Read the Official Bootstrap Documentation for a full list of instructions and other options.

Text Color

Colorize text with color utilities.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Link Color

Colorize text links with color utilities.

It’s scary when it disappears. Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears. Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears. Opacity

This allows for real-time color changes without compilation and dynamic alpha transparency changes.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

Seeing a spider in my room isn’t scary. It’s scary when it disappears.

<p class="text-primary">Seeing a spider...</p>
<p class="text-primary text-opacity-75">Seeing a spider...</p>
<p class="text-primary text-opacity-50">Seeing a spider...</p>
<p class="text-primary text-opacity-25">Seeing a spider...</p>
